title: Compile typescript projects
description: Build a node application using typescript compiler tsc.

watch.description: Whether to watch source files for changes and recompile.

outputPath.description: Target folder for the built app (relative to the workspace root). Will override compilerOptions.outDir setting of tsconfig.

tsConfig.description: Path to the tsconfig file to use (relative to the workspace root).

cleanOutputPath.description: Whether to clean ouputPath before building app.
